6553.quoteText:
Our return policy for Physical Goods lasts 30 days. If 30 days has gone by since your purchase, unfortunately we canâ€™t offer you a refund or exchange on any Physical Goods purchased from us.

If a Digital Good does not meet your expectations, for any reason, you may request a refund up to 7 days since the initial purchase. Access to the Digital Good will be removed from your account once the refund has been initiated.

To be eligible for a return, your Physical Good must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of Purchasable Goods are exempt from being returned, such as gift cards or digital codes.

Digital Goods unlocked with the purchase of a Physical Good are dependent on persisted ownership of the same Physical Good. Refunding or cancelling a Physical Good purchase will revoke the Digital Good from your Account.

Please note that your account will be subject to review if we encounter you making multiple refund requests.
6553.title: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

tosdr.case: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

6554.quoteText:
You agree to indemnify and hold FAKKU, LLC harmless from and against any loss, liability, claim, demand, damages, costs and expenses, including reasonable attorney's fees, arising out of or in connection with (i) your use of and access to the Services.
(ii) your violation of any part of these Terms.
(iii) your violation of any third-party right, including without limitation any copyright, property, or privacy right or any third-party agreement.
or (iv) any of Your Content or information in your Account or any other information you post or share on or through the Service.
